  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ChangePasswordCommand
    The ChangePasswordCommand class implements the Command interface and is used to change a subscriber's password.
    ConnectTariffCommand
    ConnectTariffCommand is a class that implements the Command interface.
    DisableTariffCommand
    The class is responsible for disabling the selected tariff for a subscriber.
    ReplenishCommand
    The ReplenishCommand class implements Command interface and represents a command to replenish a user's account.
    ViewAccountCommand
    The ViewAccountCommand class implements the Command interface.
    ViewActiveTariffsCommand
    Class ViewActiveTariffsCommand implements Command interface and is responsible for loading tariffs for the currently logged user and providing the view for active tariffs.
    ViewProfileCommand
    ViewProfileCommand is a command class that implements the Command interface.
